actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Armed Services.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Emerging Threats and Capabilities.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Intelligence and Emerging Threats and Capabilities

official_title: To direct the Assistant Secretary of Defense for Health Affairs to develop a plan for countering emerging and deliberate infectious disease threats, and for other purposes.
short_title: Military Biodefense Readiness and Protection Act of 2018

summary.text: This bill directs components of the Department of Defense to develop a plan for countering emerging and deliberate infectious disease threats to ensure joint force health protection and the ability of the Armed Forces to conduct operations in an area subject to an emerging infectious disease threat.

titles.title: To direct the Assistant Secretary of Defense for Health Affairs to develop a plan for countering emerging and deliberate infectious disease threats, and for other purposes.
